channel.title: Davidscape 508, server file problem
channel.description:
Problem: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: DavidScape/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: DavidScape.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: DavidScape/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I need help, it has happened to me on 2 servers now. I have no idea whats wrong, help please.

item.title: Davidscape 508, server file problem
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

Move your run file into the folder DavidScape and remove DavidScape from it.

Read full topic

item.title: Davidscape 508, server file problem
item.dc:creator: @cool_asian2 cool asian2
item.description:
@cool_asian2 wrote:

Problem:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: DavidScape/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: DavidScape.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: DavidScape/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

I need help, it has happened to me on 2 servers now. I have no idea whats wrong, help please.

Read full topic
